content:
The film adaptation of tick, tick... BOOM! is indeed happening, and it's exciting to see Lin-Manuel Miranda making his directorial debut with this project.

As of now, the release date for tick, tick... BOOM! is set for **November 12, 2021**, on Netflix. The film will star Andrew Garfield as Jonathan Larson, the creator of Rent, who wrote tick, tick... BOOM! as a semi-autobiographical rock monologue.

The movie will follow Jonathan Larson's journey as he approaches his 30th birthday, struggling to create something meaningful while working as a waiter in New York City. The story explores themes of creativity, ambition, and the pressure to succeed, all set to a pulsing rock score.

Lin-Manuel Miranda has expressed his admiration for Jonathan Larson's work and the impact it had on his own career. With his involvement, we can expect a passionate and authentic adaptation that honors the spirit of the original musical.

Mark your calendars for November 12, and get ready to experience the energy and emotion of tick, tick... BOOM! on Netflix!
